rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0001
rows.name: I'm back![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0002
rows.name: Good work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0003
rows.name: I'll make a fresh pot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Thanks, Lin-kun, but I'm fine.
More importantly, Vandham stopped by while you were out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0005
rows.name:
The Commander? I guess he couldn't wait
and came to see the newcomer's face?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0006
rows.name: Mmm-hmm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0007
rows.name:
When I told him you were giving the tour, he just stated
his business, said he'd be back, and left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0008
rows.name: His business... I can guess what it was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0009
rows.name: So sharp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0010
rows.name:
He wants to fast-track our newbie here
for BLADE duty with a training mission.

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0011
rows.name: That's what he said.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0012
rows.name: Pushy as ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0013
rows.name: That's typical of Commander Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0014
rows.name: I explained the situation, but he was stubborn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Well, perhaps that can't be helped either.
BLADE is also short-staffed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0016
rows.name:
I can understand the situation, but
you have to respect the person's own will.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Voluntary will, you say?[ST:wide ]â€•
Right, understood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0018
rows.name:
How about it? Do you feel like trying to work
as a member of BLADE?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_JNK0010
rows.name: Consent

rows.label: xs02010100_SEL0011
rows.name: Look Nagi in the eyes and nod firmly.

rows.label: xs02010100_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: xs02010100_SEL0021
rows.name: Shrug your shoulders and shake your head.

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0019
rows.name:
I thought you'd say yes.
Welcome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Your affiliation is Elma's team.
Elma, I'm counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0020_m
rows.name:
Your affiliation is Elma's team.
Elma, I'm counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0020_f
rows.name:
Your affiliation is Elma's team.
Elma, I'm counting on you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Understood.
I'll take this newbie under my wing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0022
rows.name:
Alright!
Looking forward to working with you!

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0023
rows.name: Lin-kun, how old did you say you were again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0024
rows.name:
What's this all of a sudden?
I'm 13.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0025
rows.name:
Did you hear? Even a kid like this is working hard
using her own skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0025_m
rows.name:
Did you hear? Even a kid like this is working hard
using her own skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0025_f
rows.name:
Did you hear? Even a kid like this is working hard
using her own skills.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0026
rows.name: Impressive, huh? Admirable, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0026_2
rows.name:
Hearing that, you can't just hang around
doing nothing either, can you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Uncle Nagi, if you say that, it's not really someone's
own free will anymore, is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0028
rows.name: Come to think of it, maybe you're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0028_2
rows.name: So? What'll you do?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Lin-kun is working hard at 13 using her own skills...
Impressive and admirable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs02010100_MSG0030
rows.name: 13 years old? Impressive and admirable.[ST:wait ]
